mainText:
Steve's vision and hard work has transformed my world and rest of the world.
 Things that we now take for granted and use in our daily lives are his gift
 to this world.
My family feels the pain of losing such a wonderful person. He, to me, is a l
egend who shares the same importance in world as Einstein and Ford hold.

Steve will always be remembered and be part of our lives and his life be celebrated in his work and innovation.

Celebrating Steve's life and work.
